de.mrapp.android.bottomsheet.view

Class DraggableView

  • java.lang.Object
    • LinearLayout
      • de.mrapp.android.bottomsheet.view.DraggableView

  • public class DraggableView
extends LinearLayout
    The root view of a BottomSheet, which can be dragged by the user.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  DraggableView.Callback
      Defines the interface, a class, which should be notified about the view's state, must implement.

                     Context context,
                     @Nullable
                     AttributeSet attributeSet)
        Creates a new root view of a BottomSheet, which can be dragged by the user.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the view, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        attributeSet - The attribute set, the view's attributes should be obtained from, as an instance of the type AttributeSet or null, if no attributes should be obtained

      • DraggableView

        public DraggableView(@NonNull
                     Context context,
                     @Nullable
                     AttributeSet attributeSet,
                     @StyleRes
                     int defaultStyle)
        Creates a new root view of a BottomSheet, which can be dragged by the user.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the view, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        attributeSet - The attribute set, the view's attributes should be obtained from, as an instance of the type AttributeSet or null, if no attributes should be obtained
        defaultStyle - The default style to apply to this view. If 0, no style will be applied (beyond what is included in the theme). This may either be an attribute resource, whose value will be retrieved from the current theme, or an explicit style resource

      • DraggableView

        public DraggableView(@NonNull
                     Context context,
                     @Nullable
                     AttributeSet attributeSet,
                     @StyleRes
                     int defaultStyle,
                     @StyleRes
                     int defaultStyleResource)
        Creates a new root view of a BottomSheet, which can be dragged by the user.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the view, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        attributeSet - The attribute set, the view's attributes should be obtained from, as an instance of the type AttributeSet or null, if no attributes should be obtained
        defaultStyle - The default style to apply to this view. If 0, no style will be applied (beyond what is included in the theme). This may either be an attribute resource, whose value will be retrieved from the current theme, or an explicit style resource
        defaultStyleResource - A resource identifier of a style resource that supplies default values for the view, used only if the default style is 0 or can not be found in the theme. Can be 0 to not look for defaults

      • getTopMargin

        public final int getTopMargin()
        Returns the top margin of the view.
        Returns:
        The top margin of the view in pixels as an Integer value

        Hides the view in an animated manner.
        Parameters:
        cancel - True, if the view should be canceled, false otherwise

      • setCallback

        public final void setCallback(@Nullable
                              DraggableView.Callback callback)
        Sets the callback, which should be notified about the view's state.
        Parameters:
        callback - The callback, which should be set, as an instance of the type DraggableView.Callback, or null, if no callback should be notified

      • setDragSensitivity

        public final void setDragSensitivity(int dragSensitivity)
        Sets the distance in pixels, a drag gesture must last until it is recognized.
        Parameters:
        dragSensitivity - The distance, which should be set, in pixels as an Integer value. The value must be at least 0

      • setWidth

        public final void setWidth(int width)
        Sets the width of the view. The width is only used on tablet devices or in landscape mode.
        Parameters:
        width - The width, which should be set, in pixels as an Integer value. The width must be at least 1

      • isDragging

        public final boolean isDragging()
        Returns, whether a drag gesture, which moves the view, is currently performed, or not.
        Returns:
        True, if a drag gesture, which moves the view, is currently performed, false otherwise

      • isAnimationRunning

        public final boolean isAnimationRunning()
        Returns, whether an animation, which moves the view, is currently running, or not.
        Returns:
        True, if an animation, which moves the view, is currently running, false otherwise

        public final boolean isMaximized()
